articles.title: DJI Osmo Nano Released – Modular 52g / 0.1lb Camera with 4K120 and 10-Bit D-Log M - CineD
articles.description: DJI Osmo Nano is a 52g modular camera with a 1/1.3" sensor capable of 4K 120fps slow motion, with a focus on various rigging possibilities.

articles.title: Google’s Android for PC: ‘I’ve seen it, it is incredible’ - The Verge
articles.description: Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon teases his first look at Google’s merger between Android and ChromeOS.

articles.title: Daily Crossword: The Dwight Puzzle — September 24 - Vulture
articles.description: Can you solve the latest Vulture 10x10 daily crossword puzzle clue? 13-Across, Four Letters: What a Monet looks like up close, per Cher Horowitz

articles.title: While Battling Performance Problems on PC, Xbox, and PlayStation, Gearbox Delays Borderlands 4 on Nintendo Switch 2 Just a Week Before Launch and Cancels All Digital Pre-Orders - IGN
articles.description: Gearbox has delayed the Nintendo Switch 2 version of Borderlands 4 indefinitely and cancelled all digital pre-orders just over a week from its release date.

articles.title: Logitech’s new light-powered keyboard doesn’t even need the sun - The Verge
articles.description: The Signature Slim Solar Plus K980 is available in graphite or off-white for $99.99. It can be recharged via sunlight or artificial light.

articles.title: No Upgrade Path for the Belated PS5 Version of Yakuza 0 Director's Cut - Push Square
